sources.title: Killer Diller (1948)
sources.description: An all-Black comedy and dance revue with stars of stage and screen.

sources.title: Killer Diller
sources.description: African American musical variety show featuring The Nat King Cole Trio, the Clark Brothers and other musical and comedy acts.

sources.title: Killer Diller (1948) COMEDY
sources.description:
Stars: Dusty Fletcher, ,Nat King Cole, Moms Mabley, Butterfly McQueen, The Clark Brothers
Director: Josh Binney

Dusty Fletcher plays a comic, tap dancer and bad magician. While practicing his routine for an evening's variety show, he accidentally vanishes the girlfriend of the show's manager !

metadata.Plot: A theater owner needing a magician wants to see the magic act and the magician obliges by making the girlfriend disappear not to mention the police who come to investigate. A chase begins, which gets paused as the show must go on. What follows are some dynamite musical and comedy acts including Nat King Cole, the Clark Brothers and Moms Mabley as part of an African American musical variety show.
metadata.Actors: Dusty Fletcher, George Wiltshire, Butterfly McQueen
